UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Foundation Model Identifies Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptides against Drug-Resistant Bacterial Infection
Literature.Author: Li T, Ren X, Luo X, Wang Z, Li Z, Shen J, Li Y, Yuan D, Nussinov R, Zeng X, Shi J, Cheng F

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=25 µg/ml,Human dermal fibroblasts:IC50=>50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:45% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-1025(MIC=5.86µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25904(MIC=23.44µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 47085(MIC=23.44µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1717(MIC=31.25µg/ml)
